### Pre-submission Checklist

Before submitting, please ensure:

- [ ] I am a current or past UBC student/alumni
- [ ] I have added my portfolio to `data/portfolios.ts` with accurate information
- [ ] My website loads properly and is safe for work
- [ ] I have (optionally) ran `npm dev` locally to verify the changes work
